Interface VulkanObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
Pipeline
All Known Implementing Classes:
Buffer, ComputePipeline, DescriptorPool, DescriptorSetLayout, Framebuffer, GraphicsPipeline, Image, PipelineLayout, RayTracePipeline, RenderPass, Sampler, ShaderModule
public interface VulkanObject
Represents an object in Vulkan, having an address and a device the object resides on.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    getAddress()
    Returns the address of this object.
    org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkDevice
    getDevice()
    Returns the device this object was created on.

      Returns the address of this object.

      the address of this object

    • getDevice

      org.lwjgl.vulkan.VkDevice getDevice()
      Returns the device this object was created on.
      Returns:
      the device this object was created on
